entry.title: Dense Smoke Advisory issued June 28 at 10:11AM AKDT until June 29 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense smoke. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and poor air quality.

entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 27 at 1:58PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...POTENTIAL FLOODING OF AREA RIVERS DUE TO ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES... Very warm and well above normal temperatures are expected to continue into mid week. These near record high temperatures will increase snow and ice melt and subsequent water-levels of area rivers including the Chilkat, Klehini, and Taiya.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
